content: to 1 st before the gap ssk to 54 58 62 sts on the bn k1 you will now be at the end of the bn and will begin to knit in the round again knit 1 more round on tn tn k bn k1 k2tog k to 2 sts remaining ssk turn the heel tn maintain 24 round repeat bn k2tog k to end you will be working back and forth on the bn only the stitches on the tn will not be worked heel is now complete st count is back to 56 until you have completed the heel decreases 60 64 sts 28 30 32 sts per needle place a marker at the centre of the bn 27 29 31 on either side leg k to 2 sts beyond the marker ssk k1 turn round 1 tn k bn k pull the yarn tight continue until leg measures approx 4 5 for slip 1 purlwise p to 2 sts beyond the marker all sizes p2tog p1 turn pull the yarn tight marker can be removed at this point cuff *slip 1 purlwise k to 1 st before the gap ssk round 1 k1 p1 the st before the gap and the st after the repeat round 1 until cuff measures 2 gap k1 turn loosely bobble all sts in pattern slip 1 purlwise p to 1 st before the gap p2tog the st before the gap and the st after the sample was bobble using jeny s surprisingly gap p1 turn* stretchy bind off http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php repeat * to * until 2 sts remaining after the gaps on both the k and the p side weave in ends block and enjoy © 2019 yarn twisters 3 simple toe up socks
